page.title: 16RECREATION
page.content: The chief recreational amenities in the block are a private trout fishing club at the Barns Fold Reservoirs, a gliding club at Lower Cock Hill and Beacon Fell Country Park. Game shooting is available,too, because of a number of small copses scattered throughout the area which provide cover for pheasants and partridges. Ramblers are well-provided for by pleasant footpaths. The lanes attract cyclists and motorists, taking part in treasure hunts or rallys. Quite a few people in the area own horses, riding them on the lanes because bridle paths are few. Coaches bring in tourists, often from Blackpool and Morecambe, for tours. In winter, after a snowfall, parents take their youngsters sledging on Beacon Fell.
